headline.main: Medicine; A Pill a Day Keeps the Doctor in Pay

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- It has been estimated that 40 million Americans are overweight, and that they spend at least $370 million a year trying to become otherwise.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON -- It has been estimated that 40 million Americans are overweight, and that they spend at least $370 million a year trying to become otherwise.

headline.main: Diet Doctor Defends His Commissions on Drugs; Osteopath Tells Senate Panel the Practice Is Not Wrong Says He Helped Train Men Who Make the Purchases

docs.abstract: hearing; weight reduction specialist Dr Rubel defends his methods as effective and safe; defends his arrangement with Lanpar Co; as one of drs visited by McBee, comments; other testimony noted
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 26--A doctor who specializes in weight reduction said today he saw nothing wrong in accepting commissions from a drug company on its sales to doctors he had helped train.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 26--A doctor who specializes in weight reduction said today he saw nothing wrong in accepting commissions from a drug company on its sales to doctors he had helped train.

headline.main: OBESITY IS TRACED TO SIGNAL FAILURE; Faulty Internal Warning on Eating May Be a Factor

docs.abstract: Round-up of recent research on obesity indicates links to irregularities in mechanism that tells when to start or stop eating, undue amt of attention paid to external, rather than internal, eating clues, excess number of adipose (fat) cells in body that may be related to infant feeding habits; Drs J Mayer, D W Thomas, others comment
docs.lead_paragraph: Why are there 39 milion fat Americans? Medical researchers, dissatisfied with the pat answer that pepole are fat because they eat too much, are pressing a search into the underlying causes of obesity.
docs.snippet: Why are there 39 milion fat Americans? Medical researchers, dissatisfied with the pat answer that pepole are fat because they eat too much, are pressing a search into the underlying causes of obesity.
